channel.title: Comments on: If Microsoft concentrated on ONE thing, what would you pick?

item.title: By: Komodo Dragon
item.dc:creator: Komodo Dragon
item.description: I am going to be the odd one, and say Vista. Because Vista needs alot more work still!
item.content:encoded: I am going to be the odd one, and say Vista. Because Vista needs alot more work still!

item.title: By: Aaron
item.dc:creator: Aaron
item.description: I'd definitely agree that MS needs to work on Silverlight to give it a better chance. It's great that it's .NET, but it can't rest on that being the only reason someone would adopt it. It needs to be more competitive with Flex/Flash/AIR than it is today to truly succeed and not just be niche. Thanks for the comment neil.
item.content:encoded: I’d definitely agree that MS needs to work on Silverlight to give it a better chance. It’s great that it’s .NET, but it can’t rest on that being the only reason someone would adopt it. It needs to be more competitive with Flex/Flash/AIR than it is today to truly succeed and not just be niche. Thanks for the comment neil.

item.title: By: neilweber
item.dc:creator: neilweber
item.description: Definitely Silverlight. If one were creating a RIA *today*, the most conservative architectural choice is Flex/Flash/AIR. Microsoft needs to enhance Silverlight to change that.
item.content:encoded: Definitely Silverlight. If one were creating a RIA *today*, the most conservative architectural choice is Flex/Flash/AIR. Microsoft needs to enhance Silverlight to change that.
